title: IMMT Notification 2026 - Walk-in interview for 14 Project Associate I Posts
description: The Institute of Minerals and Materials Technology (IMMT) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 14 Project Associate I Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Electronics, Mechanical Engineering, Ph.D., and M.Sc can apply for the IMMT Notification 2026. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have ...
